title: '9 pens instead of 10 pens.'
body: The seller has packed 9 pens, when the product clearly stated 10 pens. And this was their only job. It may seem like a mere loss of 10 rs, but when you buy hundreds of these products, it's a loss of 1000 rs.  The Hauser pen quality and ease of writing is as amazing as expected. Hauser pens are known for their smooth writing, and they didnot disappoint.
